bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with qi feng 臍風 , navel wind. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wei ling xian 威靈仙 , quotes HSJYF : 此藥治丈夫婦人中風不語，手足不遂，口眼喎斜，言語謇 滯，筋骨節風，繞臍風，胎風頭風 , “This drug cures males and females struck by wind who do not speak, whose hands and feet are paralysed, with their mouth and eyes wry, and their language impaired, and whose sinews, bones, and joints have wind, [also] wind encircling the navel , and fetus wind as well as head wind”.
